title: The Mother Of All Things
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B07BYSFK9DIt was supposed to be a new beginning for Elaine Davis.Returning to her childhood home in North Yorkshire, she hopes to move on from a devastating past and rebuild her life with the help of her mother and children.Sometimes though, new beginnings in familiar surroundings can come with the stirrings of memories long forgotten.As Elaineâ€™s mind begins to unravel, discoveries of deceit and betrayal reveal themselves and circumstances spiral beyond her control.Elaine must fight to hold on to her sanity; unless of course, she has already lost it?Approximately 93,000 words
author: Gabriel   Blake
